title: 96: Q&A: Breakup Broads
itunes:title: 96: Q&A: Breakup Broads
description:
The Broads do a “breakup episode part 2” and take some call-in questions from the #broadsquad regarding breakups and relationships. They chat about helping friends during a breakup, dealing with an (ex)partner’s tough family, open relationships, fantasizing about “the one that got away”, the ICK, and much more!
To send voice memo’s, videos, and messages - email askthebroads@gmail.com
